summary.para: Creates a paint object which can be used to set the 'fill' or 'stroke' properties.

param.name: paintType
param.para: Specifies the type of paint object to create.

param.name: color
param.para: The color used if the paintType is D2D1_SVG_PAINT_TYPE_COLOR.

param.name: id
param.para: The element id which acts as the paint server. This id is used if the paint type is D2D1_SVG_PAINT_TYPE_URI.

param.name: paint
param.para: When the method completes, this will contain a pointer to the created paint object.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Creates a paint object which can be used to set the 'fill' or 'stroke' properties.

param.name: paintType
param.para: Specifies the type of paint object to create.

param.name: color
param.para: The color used if the paintType is D2D1_SVG_PAINT_TYPE_COLOR.

param.name: id
param.para: The element id which acts as the paint server. This id is used if the paint type is D2D1_SVG_PAINT_TYPE_URI.

param.name: paint
param.para: When the method completes, this will contain a pointer to the created paint object.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Creates a path data object which can be used to set a 'd' attribute on a 'path' element.

param.name: commandsCount
param.para: The number of items in commands.

param.name: pathData
param.para: When this method completes, this points to the created path data.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Creates a points object which can be used to set a points attribute on a polygon or polyline element.

param.name: points
param.para: The points in the point collection.

param.name: pointsCount
param.para: The number of points in the points argument.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Creates a dash array object which can be used to set the stroke-dasharray property.

param.name: dashesCount
param.para: Size of the array in th dashes argument.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Deserializes a subtree from the stream. The stream must have only one root element, but that root element need not be an 'svg' element. The output element is not inserted into this document tree.

param.name: inputXmlStream
param.para: An input stream containing the SVG XML subtree.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Gets the SVG element with the specified ID.

param.name: id
param.para: ID of the element to retrieve.

param.name: svgElement
param.para: The element matching the specified ID. If the element cannot be found, the returned element will be null.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Gets the root element of the document.

param.name: root
param.para: Outputs the root element of the document.

summary.para: Returns the size of the initial viewport.

returns.para: Type: D2D1_SIZE_F
Returns the size of the initial viewport

summary.para: Serializes an element and its subtree to XML. The output XML is encoded as UTF-8.

param.name: outputXmlStream
param.para: An output stream to contain the SVG XML subtree.

param.name: subtree
param.para: The root of the subtree. If null, the entire document is serialized.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Sets the root element of the document.The root element must be an svg element. If the element already exists within an svg tree, it is first removed.

param.name: root
param.para: The new root element of the document.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Sets the size of the initial viewport.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.
